description: Detects the execution of the hacktool SharPersist - used to deploy various different kinds of persistence mechanisms
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - SharPersist Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\SharPersist.exe") OR (Product:"SharPersist"))) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ \-t\ schtask\ \-c\ *" OR "*\ \-t\ startupfolder\ \-c\ *")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-t\ reg\ \-c\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-m\ add*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-t\ service\ \-c\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-m\ add*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-t\ schtask\ \-c\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-m\ add*")))
